column1: '''Agatha''' was [[Farmer Giles]]' wife.  When [[Garm]] woke up the two of them with the news of the [[The Giant|Giant]]'s arrival
column2: she first recommended drowning the dog
column3: but when Giles indicated that he believed the dog she told him to be bold and quick.

column1: When Giles became king of the [[Little Kingdom]]
column2: Agatha became a queen of great size and majesty.  She was known to keep a tight account upon the household.<ref>[[J.R.R. Tolkien]]
